findings.label: Nódulo sólido pulmonar no lobo superior direito medindo 8 mm.

recommendations.text: For nodules 6-8 mm in low-risk patients, initial follow-up CT at 6–12 months then at 18–24 months if no change.

references.citation: Heber MacMahon et al.. Guidelines for Management of Small Pulmonary Nodules Detected on CT Scans: A Statement from the Fleischner Society. Radiology. 2005.

FLEISCHNER_2005.recommendation_text: For nodules 6-8 mm in low-risk patients, initial follow-up CT at 6–12 months then at 18–24 months if no change.
FLEISCHNER_2005.citation: Heber MacMahon et al.. Guidelines for Management of Small Pulmonary Nodules Detected on CT Scans: A Statement from the Fleischner Society. Radiology. 2005.
